quotes.t: The Bronx begins here physically, and it began here historically as well; this was the site of Jonas Bronck's farmhouse. Not much is known about him: he was a Swedish sea captain who was induced to settle the area by the Dutch West India Company. A peace treaty signed at Bronck's house ended years of {qword}sporadic{/qword} but bloody skirmishes between the Dutch and the Weckquasgeeks.
